mapper.select: SELECT b_num, b_subject, b_stdate, b_endate, b_price, b_task, b_corp, b_location FROM b_match WHERE b_category = 'A' AND b_subject = '%'||#{b_subject}||'%' AND b_task = '%'||#{b_task}||'%' AND b_corp = '%'||#{b_corp}||'%' AND b_location = '%'||#{b_location}||'%'
SELECT f.stored_file_name, m.m_name, e.e_corp, e.e_career, e.e_task FROM m_file f, member m, empl e WHERE f.e_num = e.e_num AND m.m_id = e.m_id AND m.m_id = #{m_id} AND f.f_category = 'I'
SELECT count(r_good) as countG FROM review WHERE r_mat_m_id = #{m_id} AND r_good = 'G'
SELECT r.r_mat_m_id FROM empl e, review r WHERE e.m_id = r.r_mat_m_id AND r.r_good = 'G' GROUP BY r.r_mat_m_id ORDER BY count(r.r_good) DESC
SELECT count(b.b_num) as countM FROM b_match b, match m WHERE b.b_num = m.b_num AND (b.m_id = #{m_id} or m.m_id = #{m_id}) AND (b.b_state = 'B' AND m.mat_state = 'C') AND b.m_id != m.m_id

SELECT m_id, m_name, stored_file_name, e_corp, e_task, count as countG FROM (SELECT m.m_id as m_id, m.m_name as m_name, f.stored_file_name as stored_file_name, e.e_corp as e_corp, e.e_task as e_task, count(r.r_good) as count FROM member m, m_file f, empl e, review r WHERE m.m_id = e.m_id AND f.e_num = e.e_num AND m.m_id = r.r_mat_m_id AND r.r_good = 'G' AND f.f_category = 'I' GROUP BY m.m_id, m.m_name, f.stored_file_name, e.e_corp, e.e_task ORDER BY count(r.r_good) DESC) WHERE rownum <= 5
SELECT count(m_id) FROM member WHERE m_id = #{m_id} AND m_email = #{m_email}
